an5.218:1.3: Appasanna nappasidanti, pasannananca ekaccanam annathattam hoti, satthusasanam akatam hoti, pacchima janata ditthanugatim apajjati, cittamassa nappasidati.
an5.218:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava apasadike.
an5.218:2.3: Appasanna pasidanti, pasannananca bhiyyobhavo hoti, satthusasanam katam hoti, pacchima janata ditthanugatim apajjati, cittamassa pasidati.
an5.218:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa pasadike”ti.
